pages.text: You can use the wand to unleash the power of the cores.

Craft the core with a empty wand in the crafting table to assemble it onto the wand. Press right button to use it. $(br2)Craft the wand once in the crafting table to unassemble the core. $(br2)Not all the cores can fill into the wand. Some cores that have no using effect can only be put in the $(l:1_io_tools/automatic_collector)automatic collector$().
